      Constructor of the ConnectionHandler
      Parameters:
      eventManager - Event Manager per il Server
      nickname - of the first player
      client - new client
      playerNum - number of the player expected
      idGame - id of the game
      expertMode - boolean value of the expert mode
      chatEnable - boolean value for the chat
      server - this server
